snippet: Studies show that healthy older adults are unlikely to have more problems sleeping than younger counterparts. For those who do have problems, they may be a symptom of underlying illness.
abstract: Studies show that healthy older adults are unlikely to have more problems sleeping than younger counterparts. For those who do have problems, they may be a symptom of underlying illness.

headline.main: Really? The Claim: Sleep Quality Worsens With Age
headline.print_headline: Really? | The Claim: Sleep quality worsens with age.
